responsibilities: Develop Big Data system infrastructure and processing engine in C/C++/C# and Python.
Develop and support Big Data engine solutions, working across runtimes and distributed hardware devices.
Participate in/lead designs, and write production-level, high-quality code.
Deploy and maintain software to meet significant reliability, security, and service level requirements.
Work in a team of software and hardware engineers to deploy working systems to a very large user base.
qualifications: Proficiency in coding languages including C, C++, C#, and Python.
Experience in software development across all stages of a release cycle (design, implementation, and test).
Experience in compiler and/or automation tools and flows.
Flexibility to work across various functions.
Ability to develop and support Big Data engine solutions.
Ability to deploy and maintain software with high reliability, security, and service level requirements.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills focus on developing Big Data system infrastructure and processing engines using languages like C, C++, C#, and Python. The role involves working with Big Data engine solutions, deploying and maintaining software, and ensuring high reliability, security, and service level requirements. The skills required include proficiency in coding languages, experience in software development, and experience with compiler and/or automation tools and flows.

There is no mention of Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is primarily on Big Data systems, software development, and infrastructure, which are not directly related to GenAI or LLMs. Therefore, it is unlikely that this job involves working with Generative AI or language models.
